description: Describes the Node and the services which run on it
title: Node resource

id.description: Globally unique identifier for the Node

version.description: String formatted PTP timestamp (<seconds>:<nanoseconds>) indicating precisely when an attribute of the resource last changed

label.description: Freeform string label for the Node

href.description: HTTP access href for the Node's API

services.description: Array of objects containing a URN format type and href

href.description: URL to reach a service running on the Node

type.description: URN identifying the type of service
